name: status: abandoned
description: An issue that has been abandoned. i.e. duplicate, invalid for the repo, or won't be fixed.

name: status: accepted
description: A reviewed issue that has picked up by a maintainer, but no work has started.

name: status: available
description: An issue that has been reviewed, but not picked up by a maintainer.

name: status: blocked
description: An issue delayed due to lack of response from submitter.

name: status: complete
description: An issue that has been completed and is awaiting submitter confirmation.

name: status: in progress
description: A reviewed issue that has been picked up by a maintainer and is actively being worked on.

name: status: on hold
description: An issue on-hold due to maintainer delay.

name: status: pending
description: An issue that has been created, but not reviewed.

name: status: review needed
description: An issue that has been completed and is awaiting internal review.

name: status: revision needed
description: An issue that need a revision based on internal review.

name: type: chore
description: An issue related to code quality rather than an issue or feature.  i.e. code style, refactoring.

name: type: issue
description: An issue related to a bug.

name: type: testing
description: An issue related to missing or incorrect tests.

name: üëè good first issue
description: A good first issues that can assist others contributing for the first time.

name: üö® critical
description: An issue that is breaking things or related to security.
